Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Grand, Cicero and North Ave due to, street blockage near North/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Grand, Cicero and North Ave due to, street blockage near North/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
